20101222024140.000|20101222024141.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20101222024141.000|20101222024141.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20101222024141.000|20101222024143.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20101222024143.000|20101222024143.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20101222024143.000|20101222024146.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20101222024146.000|20101222024147.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20101222024147.000|20101222024147.000|CC1|       if you have severe       
20101222024147.000|20101222024149.000|CC1|         abdominal pain         
20101222024149.000|20101222024149.000|CC1|      or become constipated     
20101222024149.000|20101222024151.000|CC1|     for three or more days.    
20101222024151.000|20101222024151.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20101222024151.000|20101222024153.000|CC1|         blurred vision,        
20101222024153.000|20101222024153.000|CC1|  so use caution while driving  
20101222024153.000|20101222024156.000|CC1|     or doing unsafe tasks.     
20101222024156.000|20101222024156.000|CC1|     Common side effects are    
20101222024156.000|20101222024158.000|CC1|    dry mouth, constipation,    
20101222024158.000|20101222024200.000|CC1|        and indigestion.        
20101222024200.000|20101222024200.000|CC1|            ( woman )           
20101222024200.000|20101222024202.000|CC1| You have better things to join 
20101222024202.000|20101222024202.000|CC1|       than always a line       
20101222024202.000|20101222024204.000|CC1|        for the bathroom.       
20101222024204.000|20101222024204.000|CC1|           So, pipe up          
20101222024204.000|20101222024207.000|CC1|    and ask your doctor today

20101222024617.000|20101222024627.000|CC1|WITH A RECORD.                  
20101222024627.000|20101222024853.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101222024627.000|20101222024627.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101222024627.000|20101222024629.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101222024629.000|20101222024631.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101222024631.000|20101222024633.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101222024633.000|20101222024633.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101222024633.000|20101222024635.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101222024635.000|20101222024635.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101222024635.000|20101222024637.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101222024637.000|20101222024637.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101222024637.000|20101222024639.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101222024639.000|20101222024639.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:46:00 of 1:00:00
20101222024639.000|20101222024641.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101222024641.000|20101222024641.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101222024641.000|20101222024643.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101222024643.000|20101222024643.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101222024643.000|20101222024646.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101222024646.000|20101222024646.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101222024646.000|20101222024648.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101222024648.000|20101222024648.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101222024648.000|20101222024651.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101222024651.000|20101222024651.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101222024651.000|20101222024652.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101222024652.000|20101222024652.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101222024652.000|20101222024654.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101222024654.000|20101222024656.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101222024656.000|20101222024656.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101222024656.000|20101222024658.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101222024658.000|20101222024658.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101222024658.000|20101222024700.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101222024700.000|20101222024701.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101222024701.000|20101222024701.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101222024701.000|20101222024703.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101222024703.000|20101222024703.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101222024703.000|20101222024706.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101222024706.000|20101222024706.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101222024706.000|20101222024708.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101222024708.000|20101222024709.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101222024709.000|20101222024709.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101222024709.000|20101222024712.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101222024712.000|20101222024712.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101222024712.000|20101222024714.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101222024714.000|20101222024714.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101222024714.000|20101222024716.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101222024716.000|20101222024716.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101222024716.000|20101222024718.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101222024718.000|20101222024718.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101222024718.000|20101222024720.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101222024720.000|20101222024720.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101222024720.000|20101222024723.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101222024723.000|20101222024724.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101222024724.000|20101222024726.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101222024726.000|20101222024726.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20101222024726.000|20101222024729.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20101222024729.000|20101222024729.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20101222024729.000|20101222024731.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101222024731.000|20101222024731.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20101222024731.000|20101222024734.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20101222024734.000|20101222024735.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101222024735.000|20101222024736.000|CC1|    WITH RHEUMATOID ARTHRITIS,  
20101222024736.000|20101222024737.000|CC1|   THERE'S THE LIFE YOU LIVE...

20101222024742.000|20101222024742.000|CC1|  THE #1 MOST DOCTOR-PRESCRIBED 
20101222024742.000|20101222024746.000|CC1|    BIOLOGIC MEDICINE FOR RA.   
20101222024743.000|20101222024743.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:47:00 of 1:00:00
20101222024746.000|20101222024746.000|CC1|  Enbrel CAN HELP RELIEVE PAIN, 
20101222024746.000|20101222024749.000|CC1|       STIFFNESS, FATIGUE,      
20101222024749.000|20101222024751.000|CC1|      AND STOP JOINT DAMAGE.    
20101222024751.000|20101222024751.000|CC1|    BECAUSE Enbrel SUPPRESSES   
20101222024751.000|20101222024753.000|CC1|       YOUR IMMUNE SYSTEM,      
20101222024753.000|20101222024753.000|CC1|    IT MAY LOWER YOUR ABILITY   
20101222024753.000|20101222024756.000|CC1|       TO FIGHT INFECTIONS.     
20101222024756.000|20101222024756.000|CC1|    SERIOUS, SOMETIMES FATAL,   
20101222024756.000|20101222024757.000|CC1|              EVENTS            
20101222024757.000|20101222024757.000|CC1|      INCLUDING INFECTIONS,     
20101222024757.000|20101222024800.000|CC1|          TUBERCULOSIS,         
20101222024800.000|20101222024801.000|CC1|   LYMPHOMA, AND OTHER CANCERS, 
20101222024801.000|20101222024801.000|CC1|      AND NERVOUS SYSTEM AND    
20101222024801.000|20101222024803.000|CC1|  BLOOD DISORDERS HAVE OCCURRED.
20101222024803.000|20101222024805.000|CC1|     BEFORE STARTING Enbrel,    
20101222024805.000|20101222024805.000|CC1|   YOUR DOCTOR SHOULD TEST YOU  
20101222024805.000|20101222024807.000|CC1|        FOR TUBERCULOSIS.       
20101222024807.000|20101222024807.000|CC1|   ASK YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU LIVE  
20101222024807.000|20101222024810.000|CC1|     OR HAVE LIVED IN AN AREA   
20101222024810.000|20101222024810.000|CC1| WHERE CERTAIN FUNGAL INFECTIONS
20101222024810.000|20101222024812.000|CC1|           ARE COMMON.          
20101222024812.000|20101222024812.000|CC1|  DON'T START Enbrel IF YOU HAVE
20101222024812.000|20101222024815.000|CC1|    AN INFECTION LIKE THE FLU.  
20101222024815.000|20101222024815.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20101222024815.000|20101222024817.000|CC1|  IF YOU'RE PRONE TO INFECTIONS,
20101222024817.000|20101222024817.000|CC1|       HAVE CUTS OR SORES,      
20101222024817.000|20101222024820.000|CC1|      HAVE HAD HEPATITIS B,     
20101222024820.000|20101222024820.000|CC1|        HAVE BEEN TREATED

20101222024821.000|20101222024823.000|CC1|          YOU EXPERIENCE

20101222024823.000|20101222024826.000|CC1|      BLEEDING, OR PALENESS.

20101222025201.000|20101222025201.000|CC1|       COPD makes it hard       
20101222025201.000|20101222025203.000|CC1|       for me to breathe.

20101222025206.000|20101222025206.000|CC1| So now, I can join the fun and 
20101222025206.000|20101222025209.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101222025209.000|20101222025211.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101222025211.000|20101222025211.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101222025211.000|20101222025213.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchPGiti,
20101222025213.000|20101222025215.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101222025215.000|20101222025215.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101222025215.000|20101222025218.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101222025218.000|20101222025219.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101222025219.000|20101222025219.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101222025219.000|20101222025222.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101222025222.000|20101222025222.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101222025222.000|20101222025225.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101222025225.000|20101222025225.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101222025225.000|20101222025227.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101222025227.000|20101222025227.000|CC1|        working together        
20101222025227.000|20101222025228.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101222025228.000|20101222025228.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101222025228.000|20101222025232.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101222025232.000|20101222025232.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101222025232.000|20101222025234.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101222025234.000|20101222025236.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101222025236.000|20101222025236.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101222025236.000|20101222025238.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101222025238.000|20101222025238.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101222025238.000|20101222025240.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101222025240.000|20101222025241.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101222025241.000|20101222025241.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101222025241.000|20101222025243.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101222025243.000|20101222025243.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101222025243.000|20101222025245.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.
